revised_title: On the Action of Solar Spectrum Rays on Vegetable Colours: Chrysotype and Cyanotype Processes
topics: Heat and Light in the Solar Spectrum
tldr: The author, John Frederick William Herschel, describes new photographic processes, the Chrysotype and Cyanotype, and discusses the role of heat and light in the solar spectrum. He also explores the photographic properties of mercury and the chemical qualities of heat radiated from iron.
